segments.text: I'm watching this scene and my heart is really starting to pound.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That overflowing sink is getting worse by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading like a small river across the floor, and the woman just doesn't see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so nervous to see her standing there, so close to slipping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then there are the children; that stool is terribly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, I'm sure of it, and he could get seriously hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is so focused on the cookies she isn't even seeing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the crash if he falls, perhaps bringing the cookie jar down with him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The combination of wet floor and a falling child is truly terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before a real accident occurs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm exterior of the scene is deceptive; it's a powder keg.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could shout a warning to them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is giving me so much anxiety just to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
